short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web browser extension used to utilize, assist, and guide students in locating platforms used by the institution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension is a type of browser plugin that adds new capabilities and
features to your browser wherein it can change a browser's user interface or add web 
service capability. The utilization of modern technology as a tool to provide a web browser 
extension for CIT-University quick links shall improve the circulation of transactions 
on the official pages of CIT-U offices and organizations.

Teknoy Launcher: A web browser extension used to utilize, assist, and guide students 
in locating platforms used by the institution to offer its service;

Do leave a review to help us in improve the extension. For the Technologians and beyond.
